mapper.sql:
temp_member_integral.member_integral_id as temp_member_integral_member_integral_id, temp_member_integral.member_id as temp_member_integral_member_id, temp_member_integral.type as temp_member_integral_type, temp_member_integral.change_type as temp_member_integral_change_type, temp_member_integral.change_value as temp_member_integral_change_value, temp_member_integral.remark as temp_member_integral_remark, temp_member_integral.creater as temp_member_integral_creater, temp_member_integral.create_time as temp_member_integral_create_time, temp_member_integral.updater as temp_member_integral_updater, temp_member_integral.update_time as temp_member_integral_update_time
,temp_member.member_real_name as temp_member_integral_member_real_name ,temp_creater.user_cn_name as temp_member_integral_creater_display ,temp_updater.user_cn_name as temp_member_integral_updater_display

LEFT JOIN t_member temp_member ON temp_member_integral.member_id = temp_member.member_id LEFT JOIN t_user temp_creater ON temp_member_integral.creater = temp_creater.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user temp_updater ON temp_member_integral.updater = temp_updater.user_id
